title: ♪ Person of Interest - 4x11 - Fortune days (Music by The Glitch Mob)
author: YT.POI
comment: Why not, we are in simulation! - Fusco the man

Greer : Alpha ? Tango ? report 
Finch : Sorry 
Greer : Well ... That didn't take long :)
To this day this tune brings back memories, this was truly a fantastic episode.
My favorite part of the show are always when the writers give you a glimpse at how the machine works. This episode was awesome for it.

Martine: last time i saw u was in a church, u've had to pray a little harder.
Reese: if i go to hell, i'm taking u wiz me.
description:
PERSON OF INTEREST
Season 4, Episode 11 ''If-Then-Else''
The Music: ''Fortune Days'' by The Glitch Mob
